definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on

sentences.english: the ascendant Democrats would merely drag their feet on trade matters.
sentences.chinese: 民主党的上升只会拖拽外贸的脚步。

sentences.english: Old fashioned locomotive emitting steam, locked onto empty cars.
sentences.chinese: 散发着蒸汽的老式火车头拖拽着空车皮。

sentences.english: Click and drag the incoming arrow from the element to an empty diagram location.
sentences.chinese: 点击引入的箭头，从元素拖拽到一个空图位置。

sentences.english: I feel as if I’m always dragging my wayward brain back to the text.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好像我总是在把移开的思绪拖拽到文章中。

sentences.english: The forepaws are also used for burrowing and for dragging heavier logs .
sentences.chinese: 它们的前爪还可以用来打洞和拖拽较重的树干。

sentences.english: Websites can be “pinned” by dragging them into the taskbar.
sentences.chinese: 可以将站点拖拽到任务栏上将其“钉住”。

sentences.english: Next, click the diagram frame and drag it to the lifeline.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，点击这个图框并将它拖拽到生命线。

sentences.english: Just drag the links into your bookmarks bar to use it.
sentences.chinese: 把那个链接拖拽到你的书签栏上就可以用了。

sentences.english: Script packages can be included in patterns using the same drag-and-drop configuration builder.
sentences.chinese: 脚本包可以通过拖拽式配置构建器包含到模式中。

sentences.english: Some of the airborne forces were carried toward their destinations by gliders towed behind transport aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 某些空降部队乘坐由运输机拖拽的滑翔机前往目的地。

sentences.english: We can click and drag to add a child to this ZSphere…
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在子球上点击拖拽加入这个子球的子球。

sentences.english: Swimlanes can be moved so that it is easier to draw activity diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 泳道可以移动，这样拖拽活动图就变得更加容易。

sentences.english: A simple drag-and-drop installation wouldn’t work.
sentences.chinese: 单纯的拖拽式安装在这里不管用。

sentences.english: This can be resolved by dragging the column edge and expanding it.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过拖拽这个列边缘将它展开来解决。

sentences.english: Click an arrow and drag to a target to create a reference.
sentences.chinese: 点击一个箭头并拖拽到一个目标上以创建一个引用。

sentences.english: You can also modify the column widths by dragging the borders.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以通过拖拽边框来修改这个专栏的宽幅。

definition: to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
to drag/to pull/to raise a child (through difficulties)/to help/to support/to drag in/to chat
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
to hook onto/to hitch onto/to catch onto
to collide/jerking motion/to impinge/to offend/to provoke
